trends: There have been 74 other sightings in St Louis
There were no other sightings in St Louis on or around June 20th 2007
Summary: two bright steady lights in tandem moving silently NW->SE constant 15 degrees apart
divs: Sighting DetailsNo noise was made by two bright yellowish lights that did not flash as they moved NW->SE and maintained exactly the same distance from one another, approximately 15 degrees in visual field, above cloud level. Objects were larger than other commercial jet aircraft moving low enough to be heard.
